name: Hi Fly A340-313 [CS-TQM] Taxi and Takeoff from Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
Ever since Lufthansa stopped flying here, the Airbus A340 is rarely seen at Calgary International Airport. This example, CS-TQM, is the airport's first visit from an Airbus A340 since 2013! After operating a charter for the RAF the previous day, this 20 year old A340-300 is seen here taking up most of runway 17R/35L on departure back to Brize Norton. ATC is included with captions, and I hope you enjoy!

I'm now on Twitter! Feel free to follow me: https://www.twitter.com/dude8472_YYC

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Hi Fly (HFY/5K)
Aircraft: Airbus A340-300 (A343)
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: All White
Engines: 4x CFMI CFM56-5C4  
Registration: CS-TQM
Route: YYC-BZZ
Callsign: Sky Flyer 411 heavy
Runway used: 17R
Local Time: 1230
FlightAware: None
